message:
Command `cd /workspace/SheepVibes && python3 -c "
# Read the file
with open('backend/app.py', 'r') as f:
    lines = f.readlines()

# Fix line 79 (index 78 in 0-based)
lines[78] = 'allowed_origins_str = os.environ.get(\"CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS\", \"http://localhost:8080,http://127.0.0.1:8080\")\n"

# Write the fixed content back
with open('backend/app.py', 'w') as f:
    f.writelines(lines)

echo 'CORS configuration fixed'` executed with exit code 0.

extras.command:
cd /workspace/SheepVibes && python3 -c "
# Read the file
with open('backend/app.py', 'r') as f:
    lines = f.readlines()

# Fix line 79 (index 78 in 0-based)
lines[78] = 'allowed_origins_str = os.environ.get(\"CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS\", \"http://localhost:8080,http://127.0.0.1:8080\")\n"

# Write the fixed content back
with open('backend/app.py', 'w') as f:
    f.writelines(lines)

echo 'CORS configuration fixed'
